title: Hour 1: Bills Beatdown
description:
Stephen A, Bart Scott and Marcus Spears dissect Josh Allen's MVP performance, what QB battle of the weekend they want to see the most as well as Detroit's WGPR TV Museum. The first black owned and operated TV station in America.
